description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Study the level. Turn off the light. Walk to the goal. LightsOut is a unique game where you must solve each level using sound, timing and memory. You have 99 seconds to pass the level which is ideal if you have a few minutes before dinner, or even "just one more level" before you go to bed. There are 10 exciting ways to play. Can you pass all 100 levels?
